title: Char-Broil Simple Smoker with SmartChef Technology
description:
The Simple Smoker with SmartChef™ Technology makes it easier than ever to make perfectly cooked smoked meals without being time consuming.

Model #15102042

SmartChef™ technology enables you to consistently create superior tasting food and enjoy an effortless smoking routine. The Wi-Fi connected Simple Smoker gives you more convenience and freedom than ever before.
Get real time cooking info anytime, anywhere and experience cooking freedom
Get notifications at key cooking times and never worry
A library of recipes at your fingertips for endless inspiration

asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: This is what authentic tender and juicy barbecue look like looks like. And this is what it looks like to cook it yourself. Smart and easy. Introducing the new Char-Broil simple smoker with smart chef technology. So you can sync your smoker with any compatible smart device to enhance your outdoor cooking experience. Get real time cooking info anytime anywhere. Cooking freedom. Receive notifications at key cooking times and never worry. Find a library of pre programmed recipes at your finger tips. Endless inspiration. Your smoker's heat is digitally controlled so it always stays at the right temperature. Your smart meat probe ensures your food is always  perfectly cooked. The Char-Broil smart chef app let's you monitor cooking time, meat temperature, and chamber temperature. Everything you need to be confident your cook is going perfectly. Your devices uses WiFi to connect to the internet. Your smart phone sends data through the cloud to your smoker. Your WiFi enabled smoker sends the info back to the phone so you always know what's going on with your cook. At Char-Broil we've been innovating outdoor cooking since 1948. Along the way we've listened to you and learned about the features you need to cook with confidence. The simple smoker is perfect for anyone new to smoking or if you just want that authentic barbecue flavor without learning how to master a pit. It's very versatile with a wide temperature range. Everything from low and slow barbecue to hot and fast roasting just pick your recipe and let the smart chef app do the rest. With easy access to the smoke box you can add as much or little smoke flavor as you want and clean up is easy. The included stainless steel basket accessories and removable grease tray are dish washer safe. The new Char-Broil simple smoker with smart chef technology. Simply, a better way to smoke.
